story_99_00605/2401_1001_0100_10:
You can pass this point only if you have a
Pride Badge. Oh! That’s a Pride Badge!
story_99_00605/2401_1001_0200_10:
I was imitating the guard from the Indigo Plateau!
How’d I do?
story_99_00605/2401_1001_0300_10:
Looks like you’ve gotten all of the PML badges.
That gives you the right to move on to the
tournament matches!
story_99_00605/2401_1001_0400_10:
With skills like yours, I bet you could give us some
good matches, too...
story_99_00605/2401_1001_0500_10:
All right, then! I officially invite you to face us in
the Champion Stadium!
story_99_00605/2401_1001_0600_10:
Come and challenge us at our best! We’ll
be waiting!
